testcase.name: Search books by publication year
testcase.skipped: Given a book with the title 'One good book', written by 'Anonymous', published in 2013.passed And another book with the title 'Some other book', written by 'Some Author', published in 2014.passed And another book another book with the title 'How to cook a dino', written by 'Fred Flintstone', published in 2007.passed When the customer searches the books published between 2010 and 2014 years..undefined Then 2 books should have been found.........................................skipped And Book 1 should have the title 'One good book'............................skipped And Book 2 should have the title 'Some other book'..........................skipped
